title: How's the hostel scene in PES EC Campus.
content: Will my four years be buttery smooth atleast in the hostel if not in campus? Are there a lot of downsides to the hostel? Is the hostel life better than college? If not what would you like to change about it?

comments.body:
Amaatra hostel (1st year boys and all year girls) is a pain 7pm in time for guys and 6:30 for girls...no ordering food after 8 this is after you reach back after 5 
Leave here by 7....with way too few washrooms....so if you're a guy...your first here won't be so good 
And if you're a girl...all 4 years
So as someone who's been here a month....get a pg...you will be way better off 

Also the wifi is shit....at most times you will get 3-4 mbps and at moments nothing and there is no network here for jio...airtel barely works(not evwn decent calls)
The only thing I know is that its only for boys after 1st year and you have 10 pm in time

At least in amaatra u have some eateries at walking distance and amaatra wifi is better than ec hostel. Ec campus is in the middle of nowhere and u don't have any good general stores like happy family and fortune like amaatra. Even for haircut u have to walk a lot  as the barber in the  campus is shit.
